item.title: Bare Meta Cloud Services are now available
item.description: Bare Metal Cloud Services 지원 서비스 Integrated network block storage object storage identity and access management VPN Connectivity Software-defined Virtual Cloud Network (VCN) secure, elastic, extension of on-premises network Market leading price-perfomance Best in class - predictable, consistent performance NVMe (Non-Volatile Memory Express) SSD for fastest IOPs and low latency Massive Enterprise Scale Access 100s of cores of decicated compute in a fast provisioned cloud model Elasticity, scale, flexibility & choice of development Secuity Hardening
